title: 點睇呢班大陸仔咁話香港

replies.msg:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vD75pvt7ThE
其中一個咁講
Hongkong is still in top 10 because it has political support of mainland. It would break down very quickly if Mainland would give it up. I dont see any potential and interests anymore for supporting hongkong so much. Those supports have just made many hongkong citizens arrogant and ungrateful. Some even act like spoiled kids who dont want to accept their identities as Chinese. It is soooooo frustrating and annoying. Stop making Hongkong special!
